old: 錬金の証　アルケミスト戦術試練

アルケミストの基本戦術を学ぶため
修練の祠にて試練に挑む
new:
In order to learn the basic tactics of Alchemist,
challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

old: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
new: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel

old: アルケムで錬成物質を付着させ、敵の注意を引け
new:
Attach alchemical stakes to an enemy with Alchemy, and
draw their attention.

old: クラスターで錬成物質を付着させ、敵の注意を引け
new:
Attach alchemical stakes to an enemy using Cluster, and
draw their attention.

old: 錬成物質をさらに付着させ、より敵の注意を引け
new:
Amplify the alchemical stakes by attacking them more,
and draw more enemy attention.

old: アルケム・フーガで敵の攻撃を避けろ
new: Avoid an enemy attack with Alchemical Fuga

old: 錬成物質を敵に2体以上付着させよ
new: Attach two masses of alchemical stakes to the enemy.

old: 敵に付着した錬成物質をエリクシルで解放せよ
new:
Unleash the power of the alchemical stakes on the enemy
with Elixir.

old: 最奥の敵にしがみつきコンクラスターで攻撃せよ
new:
Cling to the enemy in the deeper chamber and attack them
with Concluster.

old: 最奥にある＜錬金の証＞を入手する
new: Collect the proof of completing the trial

old: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
new: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
